attributes.title: AHHHH TRUSH
attributes.review: ok but I don’t wanna sound like a Karen 🧿👄🧿 BUTTT when I got onto the app my FBI agent texted me telling me that’s it’s now worth the time of the stupid app 🤢💩 soooo I ended up getting geometry dash instead ☺️🎉 even tho it’s 1.99 it was worth it this app was not worth it 🧚‍♂️✨🧿👄🧿

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: this is the most disgraceful, unfortunate app i’ve ever come across. it is a pain to see the vile content apple allows on the app store. i honestly expected better from the company, overall. didn’t realize y’all supported homophobia and racism. to redeem yourselves, pls remove this filthy, unnecessary piece of junk from the once-beautiful, untainted app store. make the app store great again🥰🥰. thank you apple❤️

attributes.title: YIKES!
attributes.review: This app seemed fine at first and would send me non stop notifications! One after another! Made my phone freak out and glitch! The Trump team is doing to much. Please help fix this!

attributes.title: it does not work
attributes.review: I downloaded the app it was so glitchy😰I couldn’t even go on the app it sucked. What is this? I really wanted  this app to play games but it just kept logging me out🙄😒😰👎🏼

attributes.title: apple needs to remove this app like rn
attributes.review: this app is terrible. it’s done nothing but big my phone out. it’s been glitching, shutting off, making weird noises and spewing a whole bunch of racist comments. it’s pretty pathetic to think an app like this is on the app store. since when did apple stoop this low. apple needs to take this off the app store. just like how we need to vote bozo trump out of office.

attributes.title: Would not recommend!
attributes.review: My phone turned into a dinosaur after I downloaded this app... now I’m stuck under my bed hiding from it and I’m running out of white claw!

This app is filled is photos of Donald PAB Trump having ReLaTiOnS with a bowl of spaghetti! The terms of service say they sold all my information to the Chinese too! I knew I should have read reviews before downloading 😭

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: For him to be at such a high level, this app is terrible. There are soooo many glitches, it runs slow, and it freezes.

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!!🤦‍♂️🤦‍♂️🤦‍♂️
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever it gave me a virus 🦠and it deleted everything off my phone and now I have lost almost all my data you should never get this app you will regret it😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: Trumpet2020
attributes.review: Honestly when I went on the app I expected it to be awesome but it kept crashing and freezing I expected higher from trump but anyways don’t get the app
